resources.string: Location access is required for LINKA to run properly.
We\'ll use your location to help you find your LINKA lock and bike.
Since location access has not been granted, this app will not be able to discover LINKA locks.
This device does not support Google Play service. You may not be able to receive Push Notifications with this device.
Are you sure you want to quit firmware update now?
Make sure your new LINKA lock is powered on and in discovery mode (blinking blue indicator).
Are you sure you want to delete this lock?
Your bike has not been locked. Please check your bike!
Your LINKA device has gone to sleep to conserve battery
For convenient access when you approach within 1 meter
For convenient access when your phone is not present
Siren when bike is in danger
Check your bike. It may be in danger!
Check your linka. It is overheating!
This lock is already associated with the bike: %s! would you like to remove it from that bike and associate it with this one?
Please check \'I\'ve read the terms and agreement\' box.
Your password and confirmation password do not match.

On Android we found Spotify causes some issues when updating firmware on LINKA. While we work on a solution, please follow these quick steps to complete your update!\n\nIf you have Spotify installed, go to Settings > Apps > Spotify > Force Stop
I confirm that Spotify is not installed or I have pressed Force Stop.
Spotify still appears to be running!
This wizard will go through the firmware update process
1. Click the button below to set your LINKA Lock to Firmware Update Mode
2. Toggle off and on Bluetooth, and then click the button below
Firmware update in progress. Please do not turn off the mobile device or LINKA lock.
3. The Firmware Update is done! Please turn off and on Bluetooth again, and then click the button below
To lock, double-press the power button on your LINKA device
To unlock LINKA, simply double-tap on the shackle above or double-press the power button on your LINKA device
Removing device would delete the pairing and LINKA would need to be reconnected.
Set up your Phone-less Access Code (highly recommended)
Are you sure you want to logout?
Please enable Location Services to proceed
Please check network settings or try again later.
New app version detected. Do you wish to update the LINKA App now?
This LINKA App is the most update version.
Removes access to all existing keys except admin.
All the data will be lost and all existing connections will be revoked.
Lock communication failed. Please check Lock connnection and try again.
LINKA Lock is not connected. Please check LINKA Lock connection and try again.
LINKA Lock is still paired. Please unpair your LINKA and try again.
LINKA will not lock when the battery is 10% or below. please charge your lock immediately.
Permission revocation is successfully approved. To completely revoke / reset your LINKA Lock\'s access keys, please setup your LINKA Lock again in the Settings page.
Your permission request is approved. You may setup your LINKA Lock connection again.
Your permission request is rejected. Application will refresh now.
The LINKA lock is unable to pair properly. Please go to your device\'s \"Settings > Bluetooth\" section and forget this device. After that, restart the LINKA Application.
Unable to search for LINKA. Please close the app and try again.

Failed to pair up. Please check if LINKA Lock is powered on and available for connection, and then try again later. \n\nIf problem persists, please try go to \"Settings > Bluetooth\", forget this device, and then try to connect device again.
Failed to pair up. Please ensure your phone is connected to the Internet and proceed.

Missing LINKA pairing record. Make sure your device has Bluetooth switched on. 
If problem persists, 
1. Uninstall & reinstall the App and try again, or 
2. Contact our LINKA technical team.
Fail to pair up. Try again.
Your permission is being requested for administrator approval. You will receive a confirmation email after your request is being processed.
Your permission is being requested and a reactivation Email is sent to your email account. Please check your email and follow the instructions.
This lock is currently under an existing account. Do you wish to request user permission?
It seems your device does not have the existing access keys. Do you want to reactivate your account\'s access keys? We shall send the access key reactivation letter to your email.
Please type in valid email and your account password.
Please check \'I\'ve read the terms and agreement\' box.
Your password and confirmation password do not match.
The Access Code pair you typed in does not match. Please try again.
Please check your LINKA Lock connection or try again.
Your new Phone-less Access Code is successfully set into your LINKA Lock.
Your tamper sensitivity is successfully set into your LINKA Lock.
Your battery settings have been set.
Please remember this Phone-Less Access code
The passcode must not be \"1234\" or in the format of 4 identical digits (e.g. \"1111\" ~ \"9999\"). Please try other passcode combinations.
Your account does not have valid admin access to perform this action on this Lock. Please consult our LINKA Team

The app will request permission to revoke access keys. 

If you have shared access with any users, they will lose access to the lock. 

Are you sure?
Sending request to revoke access keys
An email confirmation has been sent to your email address. Please check and confirm the email to proceed to revoke user access.
Your LINKA Lock access key revocation process has been cancelled.
Your LINKA Lock\'s access keys are revoked. Please proceed to use this Lock as usual.

The app will request permission to reset the LINKA Lock to factory settings. Upon resetting to factory settings, all the users' access (including admins) will be revoked and this LINKA Lock's data will be erased from all your accounts. 

If you have shared access with any users, they will lose access to the lock 

Are you sure?
An email confirmation has been sent to your email address. Please check and confirm the email to proceed to reset this lock to factory settings.
Your LINKA Lock factory reset process has been cancelled.

The app will now proceed to revoke this LINKA Lock\'s access keys. Please do not disconnect the Lock or the Internet during this process. Are you really sure you are going to completely reset your LINKA Lock to factory settings? (Irreversible)

Your LINKA Lock has been reset to factory settings and has entered to sleep mode. In order to control the Lock properly again, please go to \'Settings > Bluetooth\' and forget this device, turn on your LINKA Lock, and then add & set up the Lock again.
Tap the name of the LINKA device that appears below to connect
An email with reset password code has been sent to
Password has been changed. Please login with the new password.
A critical firmware update is available for your LINKA lock. Do you want to update the firmware now? (Highly Recommended)
Set your LINKA device to sleep based on your desired settings
When my LINKA is unlocked, set to sleep in…
Press the Power button to wake LINKA
When my LINKA is locked, set to sleep in…
Press the Power button to wake LINKA
NOTE: Auto-unlocking will only work when LINKA is not sleeping.
Set the sensitivity of your alarm and tamper alerts according to your location
High population density and traffic; \n low alarm sensitivity
Quiet town/neighborhood with less traffic; \n medium alarm sensitivity
Low to no traffic with faint chances of contact; \n high alarm sensitivity
A default password has been set up for your LINKA lock -
Force lock in event of obstruction
When stall override is active, lock WILL NOT retract in the event of an obstruction
You\'re all set with the latest LINKA firmware!\nNOTE: All current users of your lock will need to download the latest LINKA app to access your lock.
Do not attempt to lock bike while riding. Activating lock while riding can lead to serious injuries.
Please leave a message and we\'ll get back to you shortly.
Would you like to enter Firmware Recovery Mode?
Looks like something went wrong with the firmware update. Please try again.
Look like we\'re still having trouble with updating your firmware. Please contact us and we\'ll get back to you within 24 hours.
Looks like we\'re having trouble updating your firmware. Please restart your phone and try again.
It looks like the firmware update may not have been completed successfully. Is the color of the LINKA LED solid blue or solid green?
No, it is not solid blue/green
It looks like we\'re still having trouble updating your firmware. If the LINKA LED is still solid blue or solid green, please contact LINKA customer support.
Let\'s try updating your firmware one more time. Please read the instructions carefully, and make sure you press \"Force Stop\".
By clicking \'Submit\' you agree to Terms & Conditions
SELECT THE LOCK YOU WANT\nTO PAIR WITH
THE LED WILL BLINK BLUE\nWHEN IN DISCOVERABLE MODE
Tap the name of the Linka device that appears below to connect
SHARE ACCESS TO LINKA AND YOUR BIKE WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY
Great! Now you\'re familiar with your new lock!
WHEN YOUR BIKE IS TAMPERED WITH,\nLINKA RINGS AND ALARM
YOU CAN SET YOUR LOCK\'S TAMPER SENSITIVITY AND VOLUME IN THE SETTINGS SECTION
DETERMINE WHETHER YOUR LOCK WILL FIT WITHIN THE SEAT STAYS OF YOUR BIKE
YOU CAN ALSO MOUNT LINKA OUTSIDE THE SEAT STAYS
USE THE PROVIDED SCREWS TO SECURE LINKA THROUGH THE HOLES IN YOUR BIKE\'S SEAT STAYS
IF THERE ARE NO HOLES, USE THE PROVIDED
YOU CAN ALSO PRESS THE POWER BUTTON TWICE TO LOCK AND UNLOCK IF YOUR PHONE IS CONNECTED TO LINKA
This lock is owned by someone else.\nWould you like to request access to it?
GREAT!TIME TO SET UP\nYOUR PHONELESS ACCESS CODE
No one else has access to your bike.\nTap \'+\' below to add a friend!
Tap to modify details.Swipe right to delete
INVITE A FRIEND\nTO ACCESS YOUR BIKE
A NETWORK IS REQUIRED TO CONNECT TO YOUR LINKA
A NETWORK IS REQUIRED TO PAIR WITH YOUR LINKA
THIS ALLOWS YOUR SMART DEVICE TO\nPAIR WITH LINKA
THIS ALLOWS YOUR SMART DEVICE TO\nCONNECT TO LINKA
Turn on location provider and click OK
When you return to your bike it will automatically unlock.
SET THE PARAMETERS OF YOUR LINKA UNLOCK ZONE BY PULLING THE DIAMETER RING
your bike has not locked.\nplease check for obstructions.
You can change your lock’s tamper sensitivity in Lock Settings.
When your bike is tampered with, LINKA sounds a siren alarm and sends a notification to your phone.
Let friends access your bike by adding them in the Users section of the app.
Friends can also request access when they attempt to connect their LINKA app to your lock.
After you lock up, you can remain within the Safe Zone without triggering Auto-Unlock.
Once you leave the Safe Zone and return within Bluetooth range (~50m) of the bike, LINKA will unlock automatically.
Press the POWER button twice to lock.
Enable QUICK LOCK in Lock Settings.
Enter your PAC using the POWER button. In this example, the PAC is 1212.
Hold the POWER button until LINKA’s light blinks purple.
Save battery by enabling LINKA to enter sleep mode when not active. To wake LINKA, simply press the Power button. Note: Auto-unlock will not work in sleep mode.
LINKA will automatically go to sleep within the time selected above. To wake LINKA, simply press the Power button. NOTE:Auto-unlock will not work in sleep mode.
For areas with low to medium traffic, like suburbs
For areas with zero to low traffic, like garages
For areas with high traffic, like cities

If you remove a lock that you own, you will remain the owner but the lock will no longer appear in the app. To access it again, go to Add Lock in the side menu and re-connect to it. If you wish to clear ownership of the lock,do a factory reset on it.

If you remove a lock that you\'re a guest of, your access to it will be revoked and the lock will no longer appear in the app. To regain access to the lock, go to Add Lock and re-connect to it. The owner of the lock will have to grant access again before you can use it.
Lock is asleep or out of range

Your battery settings controls how long your lock stays awake. Keeping your lock awake longer will improve feature performance but require more frequent recharging. Auto-unlock will only work while the lock is awake.
Please make sure your LINKA is unlocked and connected. Your LINKA device LED indicator should be blinking green.

string.name: i_don_t_see_my_device_connected
string.u: I don\'t see my device connected

resources.string: Your LINKA device is now reading for updating.\nConfirm LED indicator is purple.

string.name: not_see_it
string.u: I don\'t see it, let\'s try again

resources.string: Firmware update in progress. Please do not turn off your mobile device until complete.
